title: WATCH: Get frosty in this spa's snow-filled cabin treatment
text:
... YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

There are some... interesting spa treatments out there.

The newest craze is the Snow Paradise at K West Hotel & Spa in Hammersmith.

CHECK OUT: Spa hopping: Your complete guide to SA's natural hot springs for a winter break

It's a cabin chilled to -15 degrees Celsius and filled with snow to mimic the Finnish tradition of Hot-Cold Therapy.

Sounds frrrrrrrrrrrrosty.
